# Introduction


## Essential distributions {-}

**Multivariate Normal Distribution (MND)**

$$\begin{equation} MVN(\mu , \Sigma) \end{equation}$$

**Generalized inverse Gaussian distribution (GIG)**

$$\begin{equation} giG(\rho_1, \rho_2 , \chi) \end{equation}$$

**Gamma distribution**

$$\begin{equation} G(\alpha, \beta) \end{equation}$$

**Inverse-gamma distribution**

$$\begin{equation} iG(\alpha, \beta) \end{equation}$$



## References: {-}

1) Gelman, A. Prior distributions for variance parameters in hierarchical models. Bayesian Analysis 1,
